Title: Stakeholders address insecurity, foster unity, good governance in Kwara South
Summary: All seven local governments in Kwara South held a political hangout to address insecurity and strengthen political cooperation in the region . As fondly called, ‘Kwara South G7’ that includes: Ekiti, Oke-Ero, Offa, Ifelodun, Irepodun, Oyun, and

Title: Tinubu limiting Nigerians’ choice to vote only APC in 2027 – Ogun PDP
Summary: The Ogun State chapter of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) has accused President Bola Tinubu of attempting to weaken opposition parties ahead of the 2027 general elections . The party alleged that Tinubiu tried to weaken the opposition parties through political pressure and intimidation .

Title: Singapore-based firm secures key role in Shell’s deepwater Bonga North project
Summary: A semi-submersible crane vessel has been awarded a contract to support Shell’s deepwater operations off Nigeria . The vessel, Blue Gretha, will provide accommodation and heavy-lift services for the project .

Title: Ekiti election: APC adopts Oyebanji as consensus candidate
Summary: The All Progressives Congress (APC) has adopted the consensus option to select its governorship candidate for the October 27 primary election in Ekiti State . This was disclosed in a statement issued by the National Publicity Secretary of the APC .

Title: SAN calls for probe of retired civil servants before entry into politics
Summary: Mohammad Ndarani has called for a forensic audit of retired civil servants seeking political office . The SAN is preparing for the 2027 general elections .

Title: Nobody can capture South East with defections, says Peter Obi
Summary: Nobody can capture South East with defections, says Peter Obi . According to him, the people will ultimately decide where to go, not governors or Senators .

Title: Woman, 32, rescued from 60ft well in Lagos
Summary: Lagos State Fire and Rescue Service has rescued a 32-year-old woman who accidentally fell into an uncovered well, about 60 feet deep at Number 14, Mustapha Bolatiwa Street, off Agric Bus Stop, Ikorodu .

Title: Video: Ailing Finance Minister Wale Edun makes public appearance at London Art Fair
Summary: Edun’s appearance comes hours after reports emerged that he had travelled to the United Kingdom to receive medical treatment . The Finance Minister is said to be in the UK for treatment .

Title: Plateau: 13 killed in renewed attacks on Barkin Ladi communities
Summary: Chairman of the Council, Stephen Pwajok, described the late-night attacks on Tuesday as “unprovoked and deeply regrettable”

Title: Lokpobiri, Lyon, Deigi top Bayelsa APC leaders hail Diri’s resignation from PDP
Summary: Governor Diri, together with members of his Executive Council, lawmakers, Local Government Chairmen, and his supporters, are set to join the All Progressives Congress, APC, in what insiders describe as a collective and strategic decision aimed at aligning with the Federal Government .
